t: Amazon (company) - Wikipedia
s: 18 hours ago - In 2004, Toys "R" Us sued Amazon, ... third-party sellers to offer items on the service in categories that Toys "R" Us had been granted exclusivity. In 2006, a court ruled in favor of Toys "R" Us, giving it the right to unwind its agreement with Amazon and establish its independent e-commerce website. t: Amazon.in: Kisto Par Mobile
In-Depth Study of All 92 Amazon Private Label Brands
s: Amazon stated in 2019 that they have 158,000 private brand products across 45 brands. However, The Wall Street Journal reported in 2023 that dozens of brands were being phased out, leaving Amazon with fewer than 20 house brands, particularly in apparel and furniture.
